about_the_game:
Do you dare to step into the darkness?



Deep within the remote woods, hidden from the world's gaze, stands the home of an old man with a red hat. Who is he? A hermit, a recluse, or the key to something far more terrifying? Immerse yourself in a world where past and present intertwine in a web of mysteries, each bearing its own horror and dread. Whispers in the darkness, shadows that move on their own, and voices emanating from beneath the ground will accompany you at every step. Do not trust your eyes, for they can deceive. Nor your ears, as sounds may be but a play of your imagination. However, one thing is certain: the true face of horror and answers to all the questions that plague your mind will only be unveiled as you reach the end. And the paramount question you'll have to ask yourself: will you be able to retain your sanity when confronted with the truth?

💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀 L̴̢͍͈͉͗Ȩ̶̳̏̇N̵̨̮̲͔͝͝S̵̼̺͖̑ ̴̧͉̳͛̾̌͘͝O̵̧̜̮͕͓̭͆͋̈́̎F̷̧͔̫̠̅ ̷̨̣͋̑̈Ȟ̵͈̖Ö̷͙̙̞͔̹͉̃͌̚R̵̨͇̜͚͑̔͝R̸̡͔̦̹̹͓̂͌͆O̶̼͍̠̰̲̺̐R̶̗̘͑̍̆̄ 💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀

Plunge into a world where every shadow poses a threat, and every rustle could be your last. Dare to tread on the grounds of abandoned and forbidden places, where death and madness become your constant companions. Navigate through the mazes of horror, evading the snares of fate, and fight for your life, striving for liberation. Only by enduring this nightmare to the very end can you unveil the true essence of the mystery hidden behind the veil of fear.



💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀T̡̥̺̩̰̬͈̑ͅƠ̙͙̹̼͓̙ͥͬ͋ͬǑ̰̺͉͚̹̗͎̲͌̓͜L̵̲̭͆͗̍͊S̠̲̭̪͖̈́̓͢💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀

In 'Lens of Horror', players delve into a world where over 10 unique tools and devices unveil the horrors lurking in the shadows. Utilize everything from a rudimentary camera that perceives beyond what the naked eye can see, to a high-powered lens that might encapsulate the very essence of evil.
But trust not just your sight; the breath detector will sound when unspeakable horrors draw near. Your toolkit is more than mere objects; they're the only barrier between you and the relentless dread that seeks to consume you.



💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀Lͮ̓͏̻̘̥͇E̟͎̱̒ͫ̆̀V̦̗̱͉͕̓̊̎̃͡E̸̱̯̽̋̇Ļ̠̤͍͒͆ ̝̺̩̫ͧ͞D̳̹͙̬͑ͩ͒͡ͅĔ̠̦̇̒́̚S̬̟̯̼̔͢I̼͔̹̞͚̘̘̍̚͠Ģ̯̭͉͆ͩ́̓N̻͙̆̓͝💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀

Dive into a world where over 12 unique locations blend stunning beauty with a chilling atmosphere. Each spot has the power to both mesmerize and terrify. Unravel the mysteries they hold, but tread carefully, for the shadows in these places whisper secrets, and danger lurks in the unseen corners.



💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀T̸͖̝͕̤̆̀R̟͕͖̜̘̱̐́̈̀Ḁ͉͇̹̳̈́͋̕N̡͔̦̱̼̻͖̲̏ͯͮͅS̡̗͙͖͔͉͉̐ͦͅP̱͓̦̤̞͖̆̆ͨͤ̕O̧͕̞̬̪̘̩͕̍ͅR̯̙͓̲̐̐̍͐͡T̨͙̥̤͍̠̗̗͌ͅ💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀

Venture into harrowing terrains, where your nightmares relentlessly chase you. Seek refuge by fleeing atop various modes of transport, each rendered with uncanny realism by Unreal Engine 5.3's advanced technologies. Yet, as you navigate these lifelike terrains, remember: technology might offer escape, but can it truly shield you from the terrors lurking in the shadows? Every rev and turn may just be leading you deeper into the heart of darkness.



💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀гєค๔ץ Շ๏ Ŧคςє ץ๏ยг ๔єєקєรՇ Ŧєคгร?💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀

content_descriptors.notes: Our players should be aware that the game features scenes of violence and intense fear. However, it does not include explicit sexual scenes or substance abuse. Some plot elements might be distressing or triggering for sensitive players.

Certain graphical elements were acquired from the Epic Store and are used in accordance with the licensing agreements of that platform.
Any unauthorized use, including reproduction, modification, or distribution of the game, is strictly prohibited without written permission from [DaisyCreators].

Please review the "End User License Agreement" (EULA) before installing or using this game.
name: Lens Of Horror

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (Version 1909 or Newer)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, Intel Core i7-4770K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 (4 GB), AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT (4 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (Version 1909 or Newer)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X, Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT (8 GB), AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: Descend into the psyche of an elder known for his red hat. Is his world an illusion or a horrifying reality? Each shadow holds untold secrets, with a line blurring reality and delusion. Seek the truth, but it unveils itself only at the end. Are you brave enough to look through the Lens of Horror?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Russian, Italian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
